trans-unit.target: TEXT_FESGSC2016SHARE_00329_STAFF00329_000_000<tab>The Gold Saucer would be nothing without its many loyal patrons, and we are showing our undying appreciation with a special limited-time event!
TEXT_FESGSC2016SHARE_00329_STAFF00329_000_001<tab>All attractions will yield 50% more MGP, so fill your coinpurse to the brim and avail yourself all the Gold Saucer has to offer!
